#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long n;
    float a,f,curr;
    char str[1000010];
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    scanf("%s",str);
    scanf("%f %f",&a,&f);
    curr = a;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(str[i] == str[i-1])
            curr += a;
        else
            curr = a;
        if(curr>=f)
        {
            printf("NO\n");
            return 0;
        }
    }
    printf("YES\n");
    return 0;
}
